description: Fix bug related to retrying requests when 500 status codes are received (`issue botocore 302 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/302>`__)
Fix when when using S3 in the ``cn-north-1`` region (`issue botocore 301 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/301>`__)
Fix pagination bug when using the ``get-records`` operation (`issue botocore 304 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/304>`__)
